rule.name: generateColumnsBrowser
rule.description: This interface showcases the columns browser
rule.definition: load( local!path, local!selection, { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_hierarchyBrowserFieldColumns"( label: "Sample Hierarchical Dataset", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "Click on a drillable node (>) to navigate the hierarchy. Click on a node that shows a checkmark on hover to select it.", helpTooltip: "Nodes with even values are drillable. Nodes divisble by 3 are not selectable. Drillable and selectable nodes have unique on-hover displays.", height: "TALL", firstColumnValues: fn!enumerate(9), pathValue: local!path, pathSaveInto: local!path, selectionValue: local!selection, selectionSaveInto: local!selection, nextColumnValues: enumerate(fv!nodeValue), nodeConfigs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_hierarchyBrowserFieldColumnsNode"( id: fv!nodeValue, label: "Node Value " & fv!nodeValue, image: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"( document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"( icon: if( fv!nodeValue = 0, "HARVEY_0", if( mod(fv!nodeValue, 4) = 0, "HARVEY_100", "HARVEY_" & mod(fv!nodeValue, 4) * 25 ) ) ), caption: fv!nodeValue & " nodes in the next column" ), isDrillable: 1 - mod(fv!nodeValue, 2), isSelectable: mod(fv!nodeValue, 3), nextColumnCount: fv!nodeValue ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Path", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: local!path, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Selection", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: local!selection, readOnly: true ) } )
